publications.name: Detection of Arrhythmia using ECG waves with Deep Convolutional Neural Networks
publications.summary: This work explores the use of deep convolutional neural networks (CNNs) to automatically detect arrhythmias from ECG waveforms, aiming to improve early diagnosis by learning complex patterns in cardiac signals. The approach leverages deep learning to classify heart rhythm irregularities with minimal feature engineering.
